<h1
  className={"openapi__heading"}
>
  Generate a shared secret
</h1>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/webhooks:generateOrRotateSharedSecret"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Generates a new shared secret.
